name: Greek Peak Mountain Resort
description: A Mountain of Memories awaits you at Greek Peak Mountain Resort. This four-season family resort is located in New York's scenic Finger Lakes Region just minutes from I-81. Enjoy 55 trails complete with glade skiing, terrain parks and a specialized terrain-based learning area, we guarantee there's something to captivate every member of your family or group. Come help us celebrate our 65th anniversary season and start making memories!
